snippet.title: Trailer KKA PC V1
snippet.description:
Download link on Google Play/Link de descarga en la Google Play:

https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09VCTLCSW/ref=sr_1_2?qid=1648668208&refinements=p_4%3AMediatech+Game+Studio&s=mobile-apps&search-type=ss&sr=1-2

Factsheet:

Developer/Desarrollador: Mediatech Game Studio (Game Designer: Kabuto), Twitter: Kabuto

Release Date/Fecha de lanzamiento: Dec 21, 2017

Platforms/Plataformas: PC/Android

Genre/Genero: Shoot em Up

Description:
This game is a tribute to all the fans of the great Japanese heroes of the 70´s, Mazinger Z and his big brother Great Mazinger. It is a game that combines Arcade-style, also some shooter and of course challenges by waves of enemies that are increasingly powerful.

Descripción:
El juego es un tributo a todos los fans de los grandes héroes mecánicos de los 70´s como Mazinger Z y su hermano mayor Gran Mazinger. Este juego combina un estilo Arcade y también estilo shooter donde debes acabar con oleadas de enemigos que van incrementado su poder en cada nivel.

History:
Since 1985 creating Mazinger Z games was the engine that boosted our founder José Rafael Marcano (Kabuto) to develop video games on different computers, starting in the 8 bits with a first game not published in Commodore 64, then by the 16 bits in Atari ST and in 1999 already with the studio formed comes the first game published and authorized by Nagai on PC called Game Maker , which brought the Mazinger Zeta game developed in Multimedia Fusion with its source code and a manual on how to make games and code documentation. It was a bestseller selling thousands of units. For the success of Game Maker it was developed and released in 2001 the game Mazinger vs. Gran Mazinger which was Mazinger's definitive game, following the anime story until Mazinger's death and appearance at the last level of the Great Mazinger. This game was well known and sold not only in Venezuela but in many Spanish-speaking countries having tremendous success, reviewed even in different books and encyclopedias of the robot in Spain. After many years the author was left with the thorn of making a Game of Grand Mazinger with an alternate story at the end of Mazinger Z and placing Tetsuya Tsurugi and Koji Kabuto as the great heroes who would destroy the Mikene empire and the new renovated Kikaijus of the designs of the late Dr. Hell.

Features
You collect Kikaijus mines every 2000 points with which you can go to the store to buy weapons. 
20 Levels.
8 Final Bosses
5 Assistants (Mazinger Z, Boss Borot, Afrodita A, Minerva X and Mazinkaiser)
Características
Vas recogiendo minas de Kikaijus cada 2000 puntos con las que puedes ir a la tienda para comprar armas.
20 Niveles.
8 Jefes finales
5 Asistentes (Mazinger Z, Boss Borot, Afrodita A, Minerva X and Mazinkaiser)


Update/Actualización 21/03/2020
Many Kikaiju Attack users have long asked me for a version of the mobile game and for a long time I stopped publishing it as it is very difficult to compress a game as big as this to make it work on a mobile. After a long time I managed to make the game stable on a Xiaomi Redmi Note 8 with 4GB of RAM and a 2.0GHZ Octa-core Max. If your mobile has these features or higher download the game completely free of charge with the purchase of the PC version. If it hangs it try again and if you do not try on another mobile.

Muchos usuarios de Kikaiju Attack me pedían desde hace tiempo una versión del juego para móviles y por mucho tiempo dejé de publicarla ya que es muy difícil la compresión de un juego tan grande como este para que funcione en un móvil. Después de mucho tiempo logré que el juego esté estable en un Xiaomi Redmi Note 8 con 4GB de RAM y un Octa-core Max de 2.0GHZ. Si tu móvil tiene estás características o superiores descarga el juego de forma totalmente gratuita con la compra de la versión de PC. Si se cuelga vuelve a intentar y si no prueba en otro móvil.
